scenes.action_text: INT. WELTON ACADEMY HALLWAY - DAY  A young boy, dressed in a school uniform and cap, fidgets as his mother adjusts his tie. 				MOTHER 		Now remember, keep your shoulders back. A student opens up a case and removes a set of bagpipes. The young boy and his brother line up for a photograph 				PHOTOGRAPHER 		Okay, put your arm around your brother. That's it. And breathe in. The young boy blinks
